title: Shadow Warrior Special Edition RePack MULTi2-z10yded
description:
Shadow Warrior Special Edition RePack MULTi2-z10yded


Information:


Year of release : 2013
Genre : Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person
Developer : Devolver Digital and Flying Wild Hog
Publisher : Devolver Digital 
Publication Type : Repack
Language : English
Sound language : English
Medicine : Enclosing (SKIDROW Emu)


Description:


Remake of the classic 1997 shooter from 3D Realms, created an independent development studio Flying Wild Hog. Shadow Warrior - is the story of Lena Chi, 
the mercenary corporation "Zilla Enterprises", who was ordered to get a mysterious sword Nobitsura Kage, granting unlimited power. Upon learning that the unusual blade belongs to the ancient gods of another reality, and the intention of truly awful, Chi Len becomes reluctant hero.


System Requirements:


OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 
Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor or higher 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3870/NVIDIA 8800 GT or better 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 8 GB available space 
Additional Notes: An unabashed love of katanas is preferable.


RePack Features:


- Removed unused video game / no recoded
- Game Version 1.0.0.0
- Installation time ~ 25 minutes
- Additional content:
+ Zilla Prototype Katana
+ Serious Sam 3 Sledgehammer
+ Hotline Miami Katana
+ Saints Row 4 Penetrator
+ Classic Shadow Warrior Katana


Install and Play!
